quote_first: When I’m hungry again I check Watch but he only says
quote_last: . Cartoons are over so I watch football and the planet where people win prizes.
title: Room
author: Emma Donoghue

quote_last: , the call came. Elaine answered, listened for a second, then silently handed me the receiver. “I want you to be my Secretary of State.”
title: Madam Secretary
author: Madeleine Albright

quote_last: Or gone to Las Vegas and got married’.
title: Bridget Jones Diary
author: Helen Fielding
